quiz.title: Discover Your Training Soul
quiz.subtitle: Answer these questions to find your perfect pre-workout match
quiz.selectingNoneWillClear: Selecting this will clear all other selections

q1.question: What type of training are you doing TODAY?
q1.description: Your current workout style reveals which soul matches you

options.destroy: Maximum aggression - Destroy everything in my path
options.explosive: Explosive bursts - Strike fast, strike hard
options.steady: Steady conquest - The grind never stops
options.flow: Flow with the session - Feel the rhythm
options.calculated: Patient and calculated - Mind over muscle

q2.question: What's your main goal for today's session?
q2.description: Your goal helps identify your training soul

options.battle: The battle itself - I live for the fight

q3.question: How do you want to handle tough sets today?
q3.description: Your approach under pressure reveals your soul

options.rage: Channel pure rage and push through
options.execute: Stay calm and execute the plan
options.feed: Feed off the burn and embrace it

q4.question: How long is today's training session?
q4.description: Duration affects energy and endurance requirements

q5.question: How do you want your pre-workout to kick in?
q5.description: Different energy curves for different training needs

options.lightning: INSTANT - Hit me like lightning strikes
options.dawn: GENTLE - Smooth rise, no harsh edges

q6.question: What's your caffeine tolerance level?
q6.description: We'll match your stimulant needs accurately

options.warrior: WARRIOR - High tolerance, bring maximum stimulation
options.experienced: EXPERIENCED - Regular user, can handle strong doses
options.sensitive: SENSITIVE - Light touch needed, prefer less
options.pure: PURE - No stimulants, I am naturally driven

options.dawn: DAWN WARRIOR - Early morning (need to wake up)
options.midday: MIDDAY HUNTER - Middle of the day (10am-2pm)

q8.question: What's your primary training goal?
q8.description: Your goal determines the optimal ingredient profile

options.maxStrength: MAXIMUM STRENGTH - Pure power, heavy lifts

q9.question: What's your body weight range?
q9.description: Helps us calculate precise, effective dosages

q10.question: Any special considerations we should know?
q10.description: Select all that apply - we'll adjust your formula

options.stimSensitive: I get jittery or anxious with stimulants
options.sleepPriority: Sleep quality is critical to me
options.firstTimer: This is my first preworkout experience
options.eveningTrainer: I train in the evening regularly
options.drugTested: I am a drug-tested competitive athlete
options.noneApply: None of these - I can handle it all

faq1.question: How does the personalized formula work?
faq1.answer: Our algorithm analyzes your fitness goals, training schedule, body composition, and preferences to create a unique preworkout formula. We adjust ingredient dosages based on your weight, select compounds that align with your goals, and account for your caffeine tolerance and dietary restrictions.

faq2.question: Are the ingredients science-backed?
faq2.answer: Absolutely. We only use ingredients with strong clinical research supporting their efficacy. Each ingredient is dosed according to scientific literature, not under-dosed like many commercial products. We provide full transparency with references to published studies.

faq3.question: Can I adjust my formula later?
faq3.answer: Yes! As your training evolves, so can your formula. You can update your profile anytime and we'll regenerate your formula to match your current needs. Many athletes adjust their formula for different training phases (cutting, bulking, competition prep).

faq4.question: Is this safe for drug-tested athletes?
faq4.answer: Yes. All our ingredients are naturally occurring or synthetic versions of natural compounds. We do not use any banned substances. However, we always recommend athletes check with their specific organization's banned substance list and consult with their team.

faq5.question: How much caffeine will be in my formula?
faq5.answer: This depends entirely on your preferences and tolerance. During the quiz, you'll specify your caffeine tolerance (none, low, medium, high) and we'll adjust accordingly. Formulas range from 0mg to 400mg of caffeine. You have full control.

faq6.question: What if I have allergies or dietary restrictions?
faq6.answer: Our formula builder includes a section for dietary restrictions and allergens. We can accommodate vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, and other requirements. We'll automatically exclude any ingredients you flag.

intro.title: Discover Your
intro.subtitle: Before we begin, here's what to expect from this personalized journey
intro.card1Body: Every answer reveals something authentic about your training soul. Be honest - this isn't about what you think you should be, it's about who you truly are in the gym.
intro.card2Body: 10 quick questions stand between you and your personalized preworkout formula. Each question is designed to capture a unique dimension of your training personality.
intro.card3Body: Our algorithm analyzes your answers across 5 key dimensions - Intensity, Duration, Focus, Energy Pattern, and Stim Tolerance - to match you with one of 12 distinct training archetypes.
intro.startSubtext: Find which training soul matches you today

allSouls.title: Discover All
allSouls.subtitle: Each soul represents a unique training philosophy and energy signature. Find the ones that match your different training needs.
allSouls.ctaDescription: Take our 2-minute quiz to find which soul matches today's training. You can discover multiple souls for different workout styles.

ingredientsPage.pageSubtitle: Explore the science-backed ingredients we use in our personalized formulas

about.pageSubtitle: We believe every athlete has a unique training soul. We're revolutionizing supplements with personalization, transparency, and science.
about.missionText1: The supplement industry is broken. One-size-fits-all preworkouts ignore what makes you unique: your training style, goals, physiology, and preferences. Companies sell overpriced, underdosed products with proprietary blends and marketing hype.
about.missionText2: We believe every athlete has a unique training soul—a distinct approach to training that requires its own formula. That's why we created 2HLABS: 12 precision-engineered preworkout formulas, each designed for a different type of athlete. Science-backed. Clinically dosed. Transparently labeled. Matched to you.
about.value1Text: Every ingredient is backed by clinical research. Every dosage is based on peer-reviewed studies. No proprietary blends, no pixie dust—just proven compounds at effective amounts.
about.value2Text: You deserve to know exactly what you're putting in your body. We disclose every ingredient, every dosage, and every source. No secrets, no surprises.
about.value3Text: Your training soul is unique. Your preworkout should be too. We match you with the archetype that fits your training style, not force you into a one-size-fits-all formula.

howItWorksPage.pageSubtitle: From quiz to custom formula in three simple steps
howItWorksPage.card1Description: Every ingredient in our formulas is backed by peer-reviewed research. We use only compounds with proven efficacy for athletic performance, dosed according to scientific literature.
howItWorksPage.card2Description: Our algorithm considers your weight, goals, training style, and preferences to calculate optimal dosages and select synergistic ingredient combinations.
howItWorksPage.card3Description: Unlike underdosed commercial products, we use clinically effective doses. If 6g of citrulline is proven effective, that's what you get—not 2g.
howItWorksPage.card4Description: Third-party tested for purity and potency. Manufactured in FDA-registered facilities. No banned substances. Complete transparency.
